description.@en: To priests of this cult, no other animal is more sacred than the wolf. They represent the primal beginnings of all mankind; intelligent, pack-like huntsmen. By skinning these lupine predators, they can literally ‘wear’ the powers of the wolf, able to speak the tongue of canines and resist the bitter cold.

effect.@en: While wearing the skin of a wolf, you may use any Fellowship-based Skill to directly communicate with creatures that are wolves, dogs or other beasts of similar nature. This interaction is not always beneficial: many such creatures are skittish, ignorant, confused, cunningly deceptive or even openly aggressive. This empathy acts as a supernatural type of communication; the exact nature and complexity of which is determined by the GM. In addition, while wearing the wolf skin, you never suffer the ill-effects of cold weather or Frostbite.
